posts.post_content:
Looking for any period-correct examples of the below Hall of Famers. Low Grade/Beater condition ONLY. Does not have to be mainstream sets, either (T201, T202, T222, T213, etc.). Feel free to email me - [url]kmayusa6060@gmail.com[/url]

1900-1919
Ty Cobb
Walter Johnson
Christy Mathewson
Cy Young
Charles Comiskey
Willie Keeler
Fred Clarke
Jimmy Collins (T205)
Hugh Duffy
Jesse Burkett
Jack Chesbro
Clark Griffith
Joe McGinnity
Eddie Plank
Joe Tinker
Rube Waddell
Ed Walsh
Mordecai Brown
Chief Bender
Bobby Wallace
Frank Baker
Sam Crawford
Zack Wheat
Miller Huggins
Pop Lloyd
Addie Joss
Vic Willis
George Davis
Barney Dreyfuss
